name: Buffalo Airways Lockheed L-188 Electra RARE VISIT to Calgary Airport!
description:
This may very well be the catch of the year! Due to the ongoing crisis in B.C., quite a few additional cargo flights have taken place between Calgary and Vancouver.

Buffalo Airways of "Ice Pilots NWT" has now joined these flights, bringing one of their Lockheed Electras all the way down from Yellowknife to carry some supplies to Vancouver!

It can't be overstated how exceedingly rare this is - yes, you could drive an hour north to Red Deer and see a dozen Electras on the ground, but to actually see one flying on one of Canada's busiest air routes is unheard of in 2021! Enjoy this rare Electra action!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Buffalo Airways (BFL/J4)
Aircraft: Lockheed L-188C Electra (L188)
Flight Number: BFL1220
Livery: Basic Atlantic Airlines colours w/ Buffalo orange tail
Engines: 4x Allison 501-D13
Registration: C-GXFC
Route: YYC-YVR-YYC-YVR
Callsign: BUFFALO 1220
Runway used: 29 (1st departure) - 35L (arrival and 2nd departure)
Date filmed: November 2021
